people_also_ask.heading: While you can effectively shape your eyebrows using a razor, the hair will grow back quickly. This means you will need to shape your brows more often than if you wax or tweeze them. ... Use tweezers to pluck out thick, dark eyebrow hairs, and use a razor to shave off smaller, lighter hairs.

people_also_ask.heading: Using a facial or eyebrow razor over the face is really just another form of exfoliation. ... And as beneficial as exfoliating is, too much can damage your skin's moisture barrier, causing redness, dryness, and inflammation. There is also a small risk of ingrown hairs, especially for those with darker hair.03-Oct-2015
